evolve::Logger

evolve::Logger Class Reference

#include <Logger.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A simple class that provides a logging facility for debug and notification messages.

Will eventually be phased into all other classes
Unless otherwise noted, methods which return bool return true on success, false on failure.
Unless otherwise noted, the printDebug argument turns debug messages on or off.

bool  printDebug = DO_DEBUG 
) const

Print a message to the log.

Parameters:
message the message to write
printDebug Note that this variable determines an additional aspect to it's normal role: if false, the method immediately returns and does nothing.

bool  printDebug = DO_DEBUG

Sets the print to file flag (to tell a logger to write to a file).

Parameters:
